name: Free Spirit
text: Your strong belief in the value of freedom protects you from mental and physical shackles.
benefit: You gain a +2 morale bonus on saving throws made against mind-affecting effects and on all Escape Artist or grapple checks made to escape a grapple or to escape from bonds.
text_zh: 对自由的强大信念保护你免受精神或肉体上的束缚。
benefit_zh: 你在对抗影响心灵效果的豁免检定中获得+2士气加值。此外，所有用于逃脱擒抱或者脱离束缚的脱逃或擒抱检定也获得+2士气加值。
